channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Address Bias Against Older Workers
item.description: These practical steps will help employers and employees alike.

item.title: How to Sustain Work Friendships and Avoid the Cost of Rising Loneliness
item.description: Having workplace friends isn’t just good for worker morale, it can boost team spirit and feelings of engagement.

item.title: Why Midsize Companies Are Best Positioned to Thrive in the Age of AI
item.description: By leveraging their innate agility and measured resources, midsize businesses are set to become a role model of AI adoption.

item.title: If You’re Busy All Day but Not Seeing Results, Here’s Your Solution
item.description: This isn’t a problem with motivation. It’s a problem with prioritization.

item.title: Exclusive: Cursor acquires code review startup Graphite as AI coding competition heats up

item.title: Change Management Is Broken. These 4 Numbers Explain Why
item.description: All successful transformations look alike, while all unsuccessful transformations fail in their own way.
